ing: 1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix (such as LiptonÂ®)
des: "My whole family loves this and it is so easy; it takes ten minutes to put together. Serve over hot mashed potatoes."
ins:
Combine beef stew meat, tomato sauce, vinegar, and onion soup mix in a slow cooker.
Cook on Low until the beef is tender, 4 to 6 hours.
